column2:
'Support for computer vision tasks allows you to easily generate models trained on'
'image data for scenarios like image classification and oject detection.'
'With this capaility you can:'
'Seamlessly integrate with the Azure Machine Learning data laeling capaility'
'Use laeled data for generating image models'
'\xc2\x7 Optimize model performance y specifying the model algorithm and tuning the'
'hyperparameters.'
'\xc2\x7 Download or deploy the resulting model as a we service in Azure Machine'
'Learning.'
'\xc2\x7 Operationalize at scale, leveraging Azure Machine Learning MLOps and ML'
'Pipelines capailities.'
'Authoring AutoML models for vision tasks is supported via the Azure Machine Learning'
'Python SDK. The resulting experimentation jos, models, and outputs can e accessed'
'from the Azure Machine Learning studio UI.'
'Learn how to set up AutoML training for computer vision models.'
